body.name: Dyson Flagship Ball Multi Floor Upright Vacuum: Bagless, Corded, Whole-Machine HEPA Filtration, Strong Suction for Carpet and Hard Floor, Washable Filter, Fuchsia w/Microfiber Cloth
body.stockDetail: Only 5 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 31 mins.
features: 🔶 【Ball Technology】Navigates furniture and obstacles with a simple turn of the wrist, for precise cleaning. Steers easily into difficult places with a simple turn of the wrist.

🔶 【Self-adjusting Cleaner Head】Active base plate automatically raises and lowers to seal in suction across all floors. Seals in suction across carpets and hard floors. Combined with a powerful motorized brush bar, it deep cleans dirt throughout the home.

🔶 【Whole-machine HEPA Filtration】Certified by the Asthma and Allergy Foundation of America. Whole-machine HEPA filtration ensures that allergens are trapped inside the machine, not expelled back into the home.
🔶 【Radial Root Cyclone technology】Captures more microscopic dust. Hose and wand release in one smooth action making it easy to clean up high. One-click hygienic bin emptying.
🔶 【Tools Included】Combination Tool, Stair tool. 【Reusable Microfiber Cleaning Cloth】One cloth per order, color may vary.
body.description: PRODUCT OVERVIEW: The Dyson Ball Multi Floor Origin upright vacuum has a self-adjusting cleaner head that automatically adjusts between carpets and hardfloors – sealing in suction. Its wand and hose release in one smooth action to make it easier to clean up high and under furniture. With hygienic bin emptying– just push the button to release the dirt. And whole-machine HEPA filtration ensures that allergens and bacteria are trapped inside the trapped inside the machine, not expelled back into the home. PRODUCT DETAILS: Brand : Dyson Type: Upright, Corded Color: Fuchsia Features: Height Adjustment, Rotating Brushes, Telescopic Handle, Self Propelled Bagged/Bagless: Bagless Filtration: HEPA Cleaner Head: Self-adjusting Cleaner Head Cord Length: 35ft Bin Capacity: 0.55gal Suction Power: 270 AW Dimension: 42"(H) x 13"(W) x 15"(L) Weight: 17.37 lbs Accessory in the Bundle: Microfiber Cleaning Cloth: One cloth per order, color may vary

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The vacuum was easy to but together. It’s much quieter then my old one and has great suction. My house keeper loves it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Have a Ball when using this Dyson Ball Vacuum Cleaner
reviews.reviewText: This is the first Dyson Ball Vacuum that I purchased. I used a Dyson vacuum cleaner in the past and it worked well for many years. This vacuum has plenty of suction for your floors and carpets. I found that when vacuuming the floor mats you do not need the beater bars running. It takes a bit of getting used to when cleaning at first. This unit swivels to get into the tight spaces. As for the extra features/options I have no opinion. I would recommend purchasing this or a similar Dyson vacuum in the future when the need arises.A good value for the money paid. Make sure to get extra filters that fit this unit at the time of purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Its a Dyson
reviews.reviewText: This is my third Dyson. They work so well and now with my rescue cat hair is no problem

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Vacuum On The Market
reviews.reviewText: I was totally surprised by the power of this machine. To see how much was removed from my carpet & can feel the suction. I've owned a Dyson DC40 for over 10 years & it broke & the vacuum motor itself would no longer provide suction.So it was time to get a new one. There was no smell like U get from other machines. Easy to dump the bagless cup then off to do more cleaning.I would put this machine up agienst any other vacuum on the market even the Shark. I do wish it have a light on the front so I could chase the cats with it.I recommend this vacuum 1000%. Plus you get a 5 year warranty on it. This is what was in the bagless cup after 2X's going over the 10'X10' spot oh my.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love it,, very strong suction!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I don't have stairs. The power is immense.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the same!
reviews.reviewText: This was our second Dyson. The first was the best vacuum ever but this one lacks across the board, except for price. It doesn’t have the suction and bulky to operate. There are other models that may be better but we are moving on from Dyson. I don’t mind paying for quality. This isn’t quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Beware!! Do not buy anything from this company!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this and it didn't work and I did get the return slip but it never worked after numerous calls they denied my request for return. Its very bulky and heavy. I am stuck with a product that doesn't even work and very expensive. Beware!!!
